introduction: The Sagicho Fire Festival is one of Japan's most colourful (and chaotic) festivals. Each year in mid

vocabulary.definition: looking fixedly at someone or something with one's eyes wide open.
vocabulary.example: I like staring at a campfire, it's so mesmerizing.

vocabulary.definition: regain strength or well-being after an illness or hardship.
vocabulary.example: Before they recoup, they will start the burning ceremony.

vocabulary.definition: the process of removing contaminants or impurities.
vocabulary.example: The flames are supposed to represent purification during the festival.

vocabulary.definition: scattered pieces of waste or remains.
vocabulary.example: We were absolutely covered in debris after the burning of the floats.

vocabulary.definition: capturing one's complete attention as if by magic.
vocabulary.example: The festival's fire ceremony was mesmerizing to watch.

vocabulary.definition: in a state of complete confusion and disorder.
vocabulary.example: Capturing how chaotic the festival is, was quite a challenge.
